title.rendered: Castor Chair Mat for Hardwood or Carpeted Floors

content.rendered:
The Castor Chair Mat for Hardwood or Carpeted Floors has the following features:

  • Protect carpet with a lipped, studded, polypropylene chair mat – 2mm depth OR
  • Protect hard wood flooring with a lipped, non-studded polypropylene chair mat – 2mm depth
